text: Rod Hernley is an American para-alpine skier. He represented the United States at the 1984 Winter Paralympics in Innsbruck, Austria in alpine skiing. He won the bronze medal at the Men's Slalom LW1 event. == References == Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Paralympic alpine skiers of the United States Category:American male alpine skiers Category:Alpine skiers at the 1984 Winter Paralympics Category:Medalists at the 1984 Winter Paralympics Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for the United States Category:Paralympic medalists in alpine skiing
title: Rod Hernley
